pitch: With over 15 years as a digital innovation leader, I bring a wealth of expertise and experience to the forefront of human-centered digital products. Having worked with a diverse range of clients, from startups to nternational and governmental agencies, I have a proven track record of delivering high-quality, accessible, and robust solutions.

Certified in Accessibility Core Competencies (CPACC) and holding a Master's in Human Computer Interaction and Design (MHCI+D), I am deeply committed to creating transformative digital experiences for all peoples.
Let's explore opportunities to do something great together!

highlights.title: Accessibility Consultant
highlights.description: I thrive on addressing digital accessibility challenges and driving innovation in this space. This spirit is the driving force behind our pursuit of cutting-edge accessibility solutions, creating a lasting impact in the industry.

highlights.title: Technical Leader
highlights.description: In pivotal roles throughout my career, I've co-designed robust data solutions, led teams cross-functional teams, and contributed significantly to the development of enterprise level software.

highlights.title: Educator and Mentor
highlights.description: Dedicated to empowering the next generation of developers, I seamlessly integrate accessibility into coding best practices, fostering a culture of innovation and inclusion throughout digital sectors.
